ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Top Everquest Cities?
ygData.msgSnippet: DENVER ROCKS =D  (gee,  can you tell I am from Denver??)  What server do you play on?? I am on Vazaelle  Look up either Katashaka (45 Shaman) or Gwenevieve (20
ygData.messageBody:
DENVER ROCKS =D  (gee,  can you tell I am from Denver??)  What server do you play on?? I am on Vazaelle  Look up either Katashaka (45 Shaman) or Gwenevieve (20 cleric) both are in The Claws of Night guild =D   It would be cool if you can get your wife to play....  That's what my BF did with me...  brought us closer together,  & is also the best birth control ever invented (who needs sex when you have everquest??)

Kat

 shulse7@... wrote:

Yea, I remember reading somewhere that it's really
popular over there. I think it was last month's
Playstation magazine. However I think it's even cooler
that Denver was #4!
I was also looking at some of the other things EQ
players like to meet about, witches, hmmm. I keep
telling my wife she needs to play! ;D Ha ha ha! j/k!
